name: ecma-error-normalizer
description: A tool to solve the problem of multiple ecmascript error possibilities. It will normalize in single error structure.

scripts.build:win: tsc --project . && copy LICENSE dist/LICENSE && copy README.md dist && copy MORE-COMMON-HTTP-PROBLEMS.md dist && copy package.json dist && copy package-lock.json dist
scripts.build:lnx: tsc --project . && cp LICENSE dist/LICENSE && cp README.md dist && cp MORE-COMMON-HTTP-PROBLEMS.md dist && cp package.json dist && cp package-lock.json dist

author: Ricardo Azzi Silva
